ygData.subject: Re: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: But if you do that, it is a one way ticket unless you are a druid or wiz lah since personal gate does not function there
ygData.messageBody:
But if you do that, it is a one way ticket unless you are a druid or wiz lah
since personal gate does not function there

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> another way to enter the plane of fear is thru the portal in oggok i
> think... thast within using any wiz for transport purpose...
>
> Nic
> p/s : didnt know got ppl take MC just to play game... SO unLIKE ME :P
